title: HOW DOES THE PLACEMENT MATCHES WORK
body: Like the title said. 2016 season 6 new ranked new system I'm fine ok but how does the placements work. i have just done my placement and lost the first 2 games thats fine ik wit i did wrong and won the next 3 games. so now I'm at 2 lost and 3 wins. for the next 5 matches i have been going positive but i have lost because of a bunch of trolls in ranked who think its funny to mess up the placement matches like riot wit is this? i went positive in those 5 matches but lost them and even in the new ranked system people think that first pick still matters. like wut? i got mid and someoe in first pick got jg and she said i had to jg cause she already locked in ahri and i was forced to yasuo jg? WTF how is that my fault i lost that game another game where tryn feeds a nasus and he ended up with 300 stacks in 15 minutes and i lost that game even tho i went positive like how the hell does this placement matches work. U can loo into my match history I'm not even joking but if the placement matches work by a matter of winning or loosing than why am i getting placed is somewhere because of a bunch of people who doesn't want to play well or who likes to intentionally throw the game. Pls reply me. Im in bronze now because i went 3 wins and 7 losses and half of the losses besides the 2 at the started was hardly my fault. As i said went positive in most of them got good CS but someone in the game was either throng, AFK or just traight up saying gg even tho the game just started. Pls Fix This

replies.body:
Here is my step by step guide to S6 placements.

Step 1) queue up
Step 2) get teamed with potatoes
Step 3) drop a division.
You didnt go positive mate, 5/10 LB, 2/11 TF, 0/11 Soraka, 10/11 Zed, regardless of a fed nasus or not, you are dying far too much at any rate.

Positive early game and i didn't say all of my matches and btw that raja game i had to 2v1 a support lux and an ADC illaoi and also the TF and raja game was the first 2 that i lost and i know wit i did wrong so dw I'm not contradicting myself

nothing to do with your team mate honestly, you die too much, thats the issue, work on that and you will climb, no point in worrying about your team, they will never change, but your kda, you have control over that.
It's not as easy as u think pretty sure u know that cause a good player is only as good as their team
Find another player or two that you get along with, and play with them. You will get out of Bronze easily if you think you've been shafted here
I do have a friend but he plays ADC and i play mid, not a very good combo

That's a great combo, you just need to adjust your gameplay to your front line. Sit behind them and benefit off their good plays and even off their mistakes. I've had team mates get caught, but turned the situation around by counter catching the enemy. 

Jungle duo isn't all it's cracked up to be. Majority of the time your duo will be pre-occupied trying to help your team mates that don't listen to your requests to play carefully haha. Two players in two lanes, two out of three lanes controlled :)
